dcterms:creator: J. Fierrez
J. Galbally
J. Ortega-Garcia
dcterms:description: The BiosecurID database is comprised of 16 original signatures and 12 skilled forgeries per user, captured in 4 separate acquisition sessions leaving a two-month interval between them. It includes a total of 400 users and was acquired in a controlled and supervised office-like scenario using a Wacom Intuos 3 pen tablet.
dcterms:title: BiosecurID
